meanings.definition: A person or animal that bleeds.
meanings.sent1: The bleeder was taken to the hospital after the accident.

meanings.sent3: The little bleeder got a band-aid for the tiny cut on his finger.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a bleeder, constantly giving her all to help others.
meanings.sent5: The sight of blood turned him into a faint-hearted bleeder.
